mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT bo.organization_name, wiid.option3 AS sales_code, bw.warehouse_name, bs.storage_code, bwa.warehouse_area_code, bm.material_code, bm.material_name, sum( wiid.material_qty ) AS 'qty', bpu.packing_unit_name, sup.supplier_name FROM wms_inner_inventory_det wiid LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON wiid.org_id = bo.organization_id LEFT JOIN base_storage bs ON wiid.storage_id = bs.storage_id LEFT JOIN base_warehouse bw ON bs.warehouse_id = bw.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN base_warehouse_area bwa ON bs.warehouse_area_id = bwa.warehouse_area_id LEFT JOIN base_material bm ON wiid.material_id = bm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_material_package bmp ON bm.material_id = bmp.material_id LEFT JOIN base_packing_unit bpu ON bmp.packing_unit_id = bpu.packing_unit_id LEFT JOIN om_sales_order_det osod ON wiid.option3 = osod.sales_code LEFT JOIN om_sales_order oso ON osod.sales_order_id = oso.sales_order_id LEFT JOIN base_supplier sup ON oso.supplier_id = sup.supplier_id
wiid.barcode_status = 3 AND wiid.option3 IS NOT NULL
and wiid.option3 like CONCAT('%',#{salesCode},'%')
AND sup.supplier_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{supplierName},'%')
and date_format(wiid.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and bm.material_code like CONCAT('%',#{materialCode},'%')
and bm.material_name like CONCAT('%',#{materialName},'%')
and bpu.packing_unit_name like CONCAT('%',#{packingUnitName},'%')
and bw.warehouse_name like CONCAT('%',#{warehouseName},'%')
and bs.storage_code like CONCAT('%',#{storageCode},'%')
GROUP BY wiid.option3, bmp.package_specification_id

SELECT msbp.material_code, msbp.material_name, mpwo.sales_code, bws.work_shop_name, msbp.pro_name, IF (wiid.inventory_det_id IS NOT NULL, 3, IF (msbp.production_time IS NOT NULL,2, IF (msbp.devote_time IS NOT NULL,1,4))) AS site, msbp.barcode, mskpr.part_barcode AS 'cutsomer_barcode', mskpr2.part_barcode AS 'sales_barcode', msbp.devote_time AS carton_time, CASE WHEN IFNULL(msbp.devote_time,'') THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS carton_status, CASE WHEN IFNULL(msbp.devote_time,'') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS carton_count, msbp.production_time AS pallet_time, CASE WHEN IFNULL(msbp.production_time,'') THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS pallet_status, CASE WHEN IFNULL(msbp.production_time,'') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS pallet_count, wiid.create_time AS inventoty_time, CASE WHEN IFNULL(wiid.inventory_det_id,'') THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS inventoty_status, CASE WHEN IFNULL(wiid.inventory_det_id,'') THEN wiid.material_qty ELSE 0 END AS inventory_count, bs.storage_code, IF (wiid.inventory_det_id IS NOT NULL, 4, IF (msbp.production_time IS NOT NULL,3, IF (msbp.devote_time IS NOT NULL,2,1))) AS `site_status` FROM mes_sfc_barcode_process msbp LEFT JOIN base_pro_line bpl ON msbp.pro_line_id = bpl.pro_line_id LEFT JOIN base_work_shop bws ON bpl.work_shop_id = bws.work_shop_id LEFT JOIN mes_pm_work_order mpwo ON msbp.work_order_id = mpwo.work_order_id LEFT JOIN mes_sfc_key_part_relevance mskpr ON msbp.work_order_barcode_id = mskpr.work_order_barcode_id AND mskpr.material_id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN mes_sfc_key_part_relevance mskpr2 ON msbp.work_order_barcode_id = mskpr2.work_order_barcode_id AND mskpr2.label_category_id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN wms_inner_inventory_det wiid ON wiid.barcode = msbp.barcode LEFT JOIN base_storage bs ON wiid.storage_id = bs.storage_id
and bws.work_shop_name = #{workShopName}
and bpl.pro_name = #{proName}
AND msbp.devote_time IS NULL
AND msbp.devote_time IS NOT NULL AND msbp.production_time IS NULL
AND msbp.devote_time IS NOT NULL AND msbp.production_time IS NOT NULL AND wiid.inventory_det_id IS NULL
AND msbp.devote_time IS NOT NULL AND msbp.production_time IS NOT NULL AND wiid.inventory_det_id IS NOT NULL
AND (date_format(msbp.devote_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} or date_format(msbp.production_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} or date_format(wiid.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime})
